I was in the beach so it has salty water inside, of course warranty won't apply, there is no way to prove it was only 1 meter and a half. If you plan to buy this camera to get it into the water, then don't do it!

Reviews.Title: Bad Camera Bad Customer service
Reviews.Author: Rehau
Reviews.Content: Had this camera for 12 months, always took pinkish pictures but changing the settings was a work around. but very slow to process each shot. 4 days out of warranty the camera stopped taking pictures, never been in water. Buy yourself an Olympus We have two and they work perfectly, even under water. Also after many letters to Casio I can have it repaired for 180.00. NO MORE CASIO PRODUCTS FOR US.

Reviews.Title: Not Water Proof
Reviews.Author: brian metzger
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera after owning several other casio digicams that were greta and I wanted something rugged and waterproof for travel.  Sadly, the first time I used this camera in water, it was ruined. I used it in less than 4 ft of water at the beach and water found its way into the battery compartment killing it.  I am 100% sure all compartments were closed and latched as directly. The camera just did not perform for this purpose. Other than that the camera takes decent pics and has a great form factor, its just not water proof and other brands might be better. I have not yet replaced this camera with another but will soon and it likely will not be a casio.

Reviews.Title: Thin good rugged camera.
Reviews.Author: Benoit "benoitmantel"
Reviews.Content: Casio was one of the first one on the rugged segment and still among the best.I used it in an aquarium (with some fear the first time) then in a river, in the red sea, and even inside a full pint of beer. Result is always good. It lasts well in cold climate, due to the rather small screen also. I lost it at a party on a sandy beach and found it the following dusk in the sand. No trouble, nothing came inside.I would have appreciated a better way to close the slot for memory card, which doesn't look reliable but hold on so far.The lens is not protected neither and therefore I take it with me with a tissue to carry it, to keep also its thinness.So compact that I can really take it everywhere with me.Picture quality is average and speed to start and time between 2 pictures is ok.

Reviews.Title: Died 5 minutes after going into water
Reviews.Author: HH
Reviews.Content: This camera is fine -- on land.  I took it into 4-ft deep water for snorkelling, and within 5 minutes it was dead (yes, all the ports were properly closed).  This is a piece of junk if you are going to rely on it being waterproof.  It's still under warranty, but I'm not holding my breath that Casio will actually repair it.

Reviews.Title: Survived Afghan Desert
Reviews.Author: A. J. Frank
Reviews.Content: This camera survived several firefights and a couple nearby explosions during a year long deployment in Kandahar, Afghanistan.  Most of my buddies went through two or three cameras.  Only downside is that the controls are not very intuitive.

Reviews.Title: water in battery door
Reviews.Author: catbrd
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for 14 months, 2 months beyond warranty and the battery door leaked.  I did not open it or disturb it in any way while shooting pictures just under top of water. The camera was working fine and then just conked out. There was salt water dried at hinge of battery door after I checked it in a few days.  I truly don't think they can manufacture a "waterproof" camera, too many possibilities for error.  The question remains, "do I buy another waterproof camera?"

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: cristian.tamayo
Reviews.Content: Excellent product and very good price in relation to others, I recommend it 100% for people looking for a quality product at low cost.

Reviews.Title: Great product and Seller!
Reviews.Author: Curious Consumer "Curious Consumer"
Reviews.Content: We've got to say the product support from the seller is outstanding - rec'd in 2 days (and it wasn't Prime!) and I had a question which was responded to within hours. Love the camera - it was everything that was described and just what we wanted to replace a 9 megapixel - love the size and features. Photo quality is great.

Reviews.Title: Is not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Tomaz
Reviews.Content: I'm very disappointed with this camera. Although the quality of the pictures is good, the camera broke at the first time that a get in the water. I was concerning, so I took every precaution before I get in the water, such as double check if all the compartments were closed and also with the depth (3 meters). I could took seven pictures only, and then, the water got in the camera. It was really sad because I was in Hawaii and I had to spend some money buying another camera, I didn't had time to search properly because I was travelling, so I bought a cheap one just to don't miss the special moments that I had there.

Reviews.Title: Just what I wanted.
Reviews.Author: R. Langston
Reviews.Content: I am no photographer, but I like taking pictures of my family and the things we do. I have a bad track record with breaking things... maybe the record belongs more to my very active son, but nevertheless I needed a camera that was shock-resistant.Well, so far so good. It is fun that it also takes pictures underwater and I can carry it on my wrist at the pool without fear of it getting ruined. I don't use the camera a ton, so I don't have a ready opinion about the battery life, but if I was taking more pictures I think the battery life would be an issue.I am really happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Amazing underwater pictures
Reviews.Author: Jared S.
Reviews.Content: Takes amazing underwater pictures. The best I've seen ever. Even better than Sony. Out of the water was lacking big time. Does not thrive in low-light. If only care about underwater pictures this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Customer Service is severly lacking
Reviews.Author: Shara
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for one year exactly today.  Yesterday the outside door that covers the memory card fell off.  I called Casio today and they informed me that the warranty was only good for one year and I'd be responsible for shipping it to them, repair, and shipping it back.  Really?  I asked them if they felt their products were supposed to only last a year and the woman actually told me "yes."  I'm very disappointed.  This is supposed to be a sturdy, waterproof camera.  Its obviously not.  This is only the second time I've had it near the water!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Evanol
Reviews.Content: Nice camera, takes average pictures like most point and shoot cameras I have owned, the videos are not as good (not HD). A nice feature of this camera is separate shutter buttons for photos and video so you can do either in an instant. I probably won't put this camera in the water, according to other reviewers, Casio won't honor water damage.

Reviews.Title: Tough little camera
Reviews.Author: Wyoeden
Reviews.Content: Your not going to find a tougher camera. To make a long story short about a week after I bought this camera( 200 bucks is one hell of a deal for this thing by the way ) this camera and I went for a wild ride across interstate 94. We rolled over five times, only a few things made it out of the vehicle intact. The camera which was sitting in the cup holder withstood the accident like a champ, yes there are some scuff marks on it but the screen isn't broken, neither is the lens. The micro sd port door didn't even think about opening and neither did the battery door. Like I  said earlier, your not going to find a tougher camera. As for the picture quality it's wonderful. In all honesty I have no regrets in buying this camera. It would be perfect for the outdoorsy person or the clumsy person alike. All around a great product.

Reviews.Title: slow to start up, then leaked and died
Reviews.Author: JimAndBarbie
Reviews.Content: When I first got this camera, I loved it.  I used it in the pool and snorkeling in Hawaii.I was hoping that this would be my all-in-one camera for both water and non-water activites.  However, the EX-G1 was a little too big, and after a while the slow startup time annoyed me.  It takes a while from pressing the power button until you can take a picture.  That started to drive me crazy.  So, I bought a non-waterproof one which was smaller and started up faster, and I only used the EX-G1 for water.Unfortunately, about the 10th time I used it in the water, it leaked and died.  I wasn't too alarmed at first, since it was still under warranty.  However, Casio refused to repair/replace it.  They said it didn't leak because of a manufacturing defect, and I didn't know how to prove otherwise.  Needless to say I was not happy.So, today I did some more shopping around for a replacement waterproof camera, and I ordered the Sony DSC-TX10.  I haven't received it yet, but based on the specs and reviews I think it will be much better.  It's definitely smaller than the EX-G1, and the reviews say it starts up fast.  Maybe the EX-G1 was my best choice back when I bought it, but today I feel like the DSC-TX10 is a better choice.

Reviews.Title: best camera ive ever owned!
Reviews.Author: vrtrip
Reviews.Content: i go through a lot of electronics because im very hard on them. this camera has with held river floats and mountain biking and bar hopping while still taking the best pictures for this price range and snap and shoot type of camera. it takes the pics fast so u wont miss the moment and is lightweight small and easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: Subpar for Casio
Reviews.Author: S. Edelman "sbe"
Reviews.Content: I have owned more than five of the various models of Exilim line and this is the only one I've been less than pleased with.  It clearly has design and/or manufacturing issues.Just outside of warranty the shutter release button popped off in without warning.  Given the camera was only lightly used (we generally use our other Casios except when we need waterproof) there is no way this should have happened.  The only thing I can think of is that the camera seals aren't working well and moisture is getting in.  This would also explain why people are getting rust on top.Casio must know there is a problem with this model yet they are not standing behind the product.  If you decide to purchase one despite the bad reviews I'd suggest thinking twice before using it underwater.  You might also consider using a credit card that doubles the manufacturer's warranty.  My guess is you're going to need it.Update.  I liked the design enough I decided to take a chance and buy a second camera when they went on sale at Best Buy.  Bad idea.  My son was using it to take pictures in the surf and all it took was one splash for it to stop working.  This is unacceptable for a camera that is described as follows on the manufacturer's web site..."The EX-G1 can be used at a water depth of three meters (10 feet) for 60 continuous minutes. Water will not penetrate the camera even when directly sprayed with jets of water from every direction."Update 1/11/12Casio is telling me they will not repair the camera even though it is under warranty.  I don't mean they want me to pay to have it fixed, they won't repair the camera, period.  This is a camera I bought in May of 2011.  I've never heard of such a thing.Perhaps they have come to the conclusion that the design is flawed, isn't waterproof and there is no fix.  Unfortunately the solution proposed, which is to offer a refurbished low end, non waterproof camera in exchange (that doesn't take the same memory card I had to buy) is unacceptable.Oh how far this company has fallen.  I can no longer recommend doing business with Casio unless you are Ok with the risk that what you buy not only won't work but that the warranty will not be honored.

Reviews.Title: Great seller but not so happy about the photo quality
Reviews.Author: Christopher M. Mcmickle
Reviews.Content: The camera is very cool looking but im not so satisfied with the photo quality. The camera arrived on time

Reviews.Title: Great Little Camera
Reviews.Author: C. J. Mieszkowski
Reviews.Content: This a great little camera.  It is durable, small, and has very nice photo quality.  There are a few tiny issues that others have mentioned with design and ease of access to the battery compartment, but all in all it is a great stylish camera. I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the price and features
Reviews.Author: T. Higa
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera.  We used it on a recent ski trip where we also swam in the pool every day.  The camera took great pictures and video while skiing and also while swimming, both in the pool and underwater.  There is good battery life.  It is compact and durable.One drawback is the size of the buttons - particularly the one to activate the video function, it is a very small button on the back of the camera that you have to be very precise in pressing to get it to start and stop recording.Otherwise we are very happy with this purchase!

Reviews.Title: Leaks Underwater
Reviews.Author: curly
Reviews.Content: This camera is very good as a camera but do not but it underwater, I never droped it or let get below under 3' of water, It started to leak in the screen area not in the door area that everyone else has a problen with. If you buy this camera make sure you have a back up plan.

Reviews.Title: Not Waterproof
Reviews.Author: Shoulderbay
Reviews.Content: My wife and I bought this camera for a once in a lifetime trip to a remote island off Belize.  Unfortunately about 2-hours into the first full day of our stay on the island the camera stopped working.  Upon returning to our cabin I opened the memory card door and water poured out.  We did not dive with this camera only sea kayaking and very shallow snorkeling.  We were very careful not to open the doors of the camera outside where I knew sand could interfere with the seals on the doors.  In fact we had not even opened the doors on the camera since leaving home.  If you are looking for a camera that will work in the rain this thing might be OK, but if you plan to take it in actual water I would recommend looking to another product.

Reviews.Title: Some cons
Reviews.Author: Martano
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and I found that not save my preferences in the menu. I should to set it up again and again. I live in Argentina and It's to expensive to return back the camera for this problem.I never put it in water or snow but under rain and the seals are ok.Sometime the wheel that open the side compartment opens by accident with my finger when using it.Outdoor pictures are great, instead indoor that has a poor color.No macro.I will not choose a similar Casio in the future except for a better and objetive reviews.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera But Rust Problems
Reviews.Author: KRich "KRich"
Reviews.Content: I've had the camera for a year now.  A few months ago the whole top part fell off and bellow it was severely rusted.  Sent it away to Casio and the turn around on repair was quick.  The new top is a slightly different color/texture than the rest of the camera.  I can only hope that the rust issue below was addressed.  I'm worried that this will happen again now.  The camera was barely used in water and was always rinsed and allowed to dry.  For a camera touted as being so rugged I wasn't too happy that it needed repair so soon.

Reviews.Title: Do you need waterproofing?
Reviews.Author: Bone
Reviews.Content: I got this primarily for pool and beach usage. As a digital camera, this is a pretty poor offering despite the numbers. Probably the worst dedicated digital camera I've ever used in all honesty. The lens is poor, the light capturing ability is hideous, and the video is antiquated mjpeg in a bizarre 848x480 resolution that'll invariably need transcoding. It's better than cell phones, but that's not saying much. If you're out and about taking photos, you'll probably want to use something else. When in ideal lighting it's passable, but nowhere near what you'd expect from 12M pixels. When the light starts to go, you might as well not bother.However, as a camera that you need not worry about getting wet, it's great in our experience. It's taken a fair amount of abuse, and it's great being able to use it under water without having a heart-attack worrying whether the external case is leaking. Anyone who's purchased an underwater case for their existing cameras will know what I mean. Being in FL means lots of light and lots of time in the pool.A lot of people are having issues with waterproofing. We've had ours for about 10 months with no issues, and it looks just as it did when we got it. Even in the hands of the kids it's still going. The opening mechanism hasn't been accidentally rubbed to open the device, which is pretty resistant, you can't lightly do it as someone suggested, not unless there are multiple models under the same SKU. Maybe if you're wearing massively thick rubber gloves...There's also a novel time-laspe setting, but the settings are woefully inadequate to do anything of real interest, which is a real shame, and probably nothing more than a simple fireware update to address the dumb software.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what i was looking for
Reviews.Author: Mendy
Reviews.Content: We needed a camera for family photos and this casio has worked exactly how we wanted. Great pictures, nice quality and very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: I have had this camera since it first came out...<3
Reviews.Author: Gift Giver
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera in RED since it first came out. I don't want to say how much i have paid :x Red was difficult and harder to find...It is the best camera I have ever had.  The underwater pictures come out AMAZING! Only problem with the camera is after recording a video the camera erases the previous pictures.  Has anyone else had this problem?? Yes, i have changed the memory card..still happens...The casing cracked but Casio fixed it no questions asked, no charges!! I would absolutely but it again!!!

Reviews.Title: handy camera
Reviews.Author: hemant
Reviews.Content: great underwater videos and pics, couldnt ask for more. no problems with water seepage or battery life. only the zoom in and out noise does get into the videos.overall awesome.

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim EX-G1 12.1 MP
Reviews.Author: Jaime E. Lara Mata "PluNoc"
Reviews.Content: Very good quality photos and very good quality vides (even under water). It is amazing how clear the sounds under water are. User friendly and really tough camera. I use it pretty much every day, and I carry it with me everywhere I go without worrying that it would get damage. Pretty good acquisition.

Reviews.Title: Great Outdoor/Indoor Camera
Reviews.Author: Egolas
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy, the camera is beautiful, it has a great design, its so thin and comfortable to handle. The photos taken with it are perfect, great quality. The battery duration is about 7 hours of normal continuous usage (taking pictures, recording video not too long, and reviewing them after been taken). I just love it!!!

Reviews.Title: shopping experience
Reviews.Author: Roger Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Hello is excellent given the Serbian and products arrived on time and without irregularidad.Fotos high quality. Thank you for your services I recommend.

Reviews.Title: meh picture quality....but still has its usefullness
Reviews.Author: roberthd81
Reviews.Content: so..i'm an outdoors man..and with that being said, i'm rough on everything i own.  i four wheel frequently (lifted/locked/exo xj for those wondering), i hike almost every weekend, i fish even more than i hike, i camp at least once a month, and starting this summer i'll be kayaking a lot.  So...you add all of those up...and you get broken cameras.  So that's why i chose this one...it fits my lifestyle perfectly.before this...i've juggled between several DSLR's (digital rebel, xt, and 30d) and have grown accustomed to DSLR + L picture quality so the shots this thing takes highly disappointed me.  I compared them to my gf's p&s; and..well, i was still disappointed.  They're very soft and the colors pretty much suck.  The video is lackluster..but livable.  But for it's intended purpose, it'll suffice (i hope).

Reviews.Title: Its great but...
Reviews.Author: S. A. Mellor "Gavriel"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my trip home on 2 weeks leave from Afghanistan, basically it was kinda important. It got to me fast and i put it to use. I used it here in Afghanistan, I used it at a water park, I used it outside, I used in in a nightclub, I used it in my house, I used it in my garage during my going away party. Here is the good and bad,The good1) It is not effected by the water; used it for hours at the water park including a couple hours in the wave pool during the rain storm (it was funny watching everyone scramble to cover their camera), sand, dropping (didn't test this on purpose but I do carry it around lose in pockets, my bag etc).2) It looks coolThe bad1) Get a cover for the viewer, it scratches realyl easily2) The battery cover is hard to take off if you have big handsThe ugly1) It is true, the cover either came open or it leaked after a couple hours of use in the wae pool. I got an error that it could not read or write to the memory card! I was not happy. The good news is that it works fine now. I took out the memory card & left the door bay open to dry. It did and it works just fine now.Hope that helps

Reviews.Title: Great camera that will last.
Reviews.Author: johnnyeddie
Reviews.Content: This has been a great camera.  A friend of mine, a Park Ranger, takes it everywhere.  He has shot underwater video, and has even dropped it.  It seems to be tough, and best of all truly waterproof.  Just what I needed.  I bought it solely on his recommendation.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Hook
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a camera to take anywhere I go and NOT worry about sand, rain. etc. etc.. Picture quality, features, optical zoom, are all within or exceed expectations from a camera in this range. Some reviewers had trouble with small buttons, but -- HEY it's a small camera ! The buttons become intuitive after a little use.I've recommended this camera to several friends and family.

Reviews.Title: A good 2nd camera
Reviews.Author: K
Reviews.Content: I needed a drop-resistant camera for my wife to use when she goes out with the KIDS. So far the camera is holding up fine to drops, some liquid spillage and being handled by children. We used to have a SONY before so I can't help comparing the quality to our previous camera. The quality of the photo's in dark situations is not so good. The delay between pressing the button and actually acquiring the image is pretty long and also depending on the mode you have the camera in, the post-processing is also really long. This camera is good as a 2nd camera if you just want something to throw into your purse or bag. I'm thinking of buying another camera for myself, to take better family pictures when we go out.

Reviews.Title: n/a
Reviews.Author: toby2010
Reviews.Content: product was durable for the most part. it seemed like the salt water from the beach caused the product to peel in areas that is covered in rubber. the picture quality was average at night, great during the day with lots of sun light. Video quality was amazing!

Reviews.Title: Works, simple to use, looks good
Reviews.Author: skidmark
Reviews.Content: Overall the item works well out of the box and is very simple.  Upon examination I seriously doubt any ability to work after being under water.... Its just not sealed that well.  Other than that it looks pretty durable.

Reviews.Title: Slim & Sleek!
Reviews.Author: JOEY REYES
Reviews.Content: When this camera was 1st unveiled in November of 2009 I knew I had to have it but money wise it wasn't feasible at the time. Well, here I was & found it for ridiculous low price of $169 sans memory card which I found for only $28, it was a 16 GB.The picture & video quality are excellent. I don't know much about cameras but I figure this has to hold true for all cameras over 12 MP's.I had an old Casio 6 MP & that camera took a beating but kept snapping quality pictures on all my travels.This camera is it's replacement & I know it will surpass my old Casio due to it being shockproof,freezeproof,waterproof & dustproof. I already took some great pix surfing w/it,something I couldn't do w/my old one. I know this season for snowboarding the camera will get dropped,beat up but will still deliver cause it's a Casio.The one thing I really like about this camera as w/most Casio's is it's thinness.Many cameras are bricks & don't fit comfortably in your front or back pocket. This camera fits nicely in my jeans when rocking in Vegas.Last but not least, this model was voted TOP Camera for shockproof,waterproof camera's this year so that must say a little about it. I recommend the extended 3 year warranty plus Accident Protection from Squaretrade. I'm lucky that the only authorized Casio Repair shop is a few miles away but those who aren't so lucky may want to throw down $34 for piece of mind & protection.

Reviews.Title: EX-G1
Reviews.Author: FlyFishinOK
Reviews.Content: This camera is perfect for my lifesyle. Fishing, Hunting, Hiking it works great in the outdoors. It is very compact so I always have it easily stored in a pocket ready for action shots.

Reviews.Title: HORRIBLE (Owner for 6 months)
Reviews.Author: Keith Beilinson "keithb12"
Reviews.Content: I bought this because I wanted a slim camera that I could toss around. The picture quality is descent, not great. It is really slow, I missed a few good shots while it was warming up or focusing. BUT the clincher is I never dropped it, but have tossed it around and the buttons popped off. I sent it in for a warranty repair and got the run around and they want to charge me over $50 to fix this. Their customer service is horrendous. Great idea, poor produc, lousy company. I would never buy another Casio product

Reviews.Title: Light issue
Reviews.Author: Alfredo
Reviews.Content: This is a very cool and stylish tough camera, very quick to take pictures and it has a incredible video and audio capture. Thee only problem is that it has ome difficulties focusing light into pics and vids, sometimes the pics might come with a with glare and also the videos but there are a few option you need to learn how to use to get the right quality. Also so far I have not been able to get the full 12 MP pic, the best I have done is a 7mp and the rest are around 5 to 6mp. Overall the fact that you can sumerge and drp the cammera without care is awesome.

Reviews.Title: Casio ex-g1 is the best
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: I have taken this camera with me to costa rica and used it as my main camera. It took great photos and videos. It's been covered in sand and salt water many times and never had a problem. It has been fishing many times and gets bounced all over the boat and gets covered in fish slime. The best test was when I took it to a water park and took videos while going down the slides. It really took a beating getting bounced off the sides and dropped in the splash down area. Some people have said that the side door can be opened by accident. I tried to open it with only my thumb and could not do it. You need to also use your index finger to turn the knob. If it gets opened under water it is the fault of the user not the camera. Over all this is a great camera. Fits in front pocket of jeans and can be taken anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Great for the money...
Reviews.Author: RWW
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the waterproof/shockproof class of cameras. Intuitivebutton design, easy to use with out a lot of sub menu's to make youcrazy. I just needed something to handle the elements with no worries,and it does the job well. I like it!!!

Reviews.Title: Casio Exilim EX-G1
Reviews.Author: William M. Doody "BioBill"
Reviews.Content: I like this camera!  I wanted a good, rugged, waterproof digital camera and I researched these attributes extensively! Something I could take in the woods or when I went kayaking, carry in my pocket and take with me wherever without worrying to much about damaging it from an accidental drop!  I have read reviews of the many manufactures of rugged cameras and I chose Casio because I have been wearing Casio rugged G-Shock watches for years, which have lasted for years and I'm sure if I replaced the battery would still be running now!  I'm not a camera buff but I like what I see when I take a picture! I can't judge video quality because I haven't used this feature! Overall I like this camera, it is a little small for my hands but I don't find it to difficult to use. I need to buy a camera float and that will happen in the near future or I might just make up a tether for now!All I hope is that it lasts as well as my Casio watches and I'll be pleased!  Only time will tell!

Reviews.Title: Great Pictures
Reviews.Author: Amanda Chinaglia
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to use underwater. Though I didn't have the opportunity to use underwater yet, this camera takes beautiful pictures and make good videos! Well done!

Reviews.Title: Great product, good pictures
Reviews.Author: Fernando C. Faiao "Fernando"
Reviews.Content: Amazing product.Just an observation about the quality of the pictures: I've been able to take great quality pictures, but I also have lost a lot of pictures. In adverse conditions of light, movement, shaking, etcs... the photos taken were completely blurred. This is not a point and shoot camera that enables you to take great quality pictures in any condition. Probably when understanding better the adjusts and options you are able to not to loose so many shoots.

Reviews.Title: Not ideal for time lapse photography
Reviews.Author: jlee
Reviews.Content: Can't really comment on the bulk of this camera's features, but as google searching for time lapse cameras keep pointing to this model I have to comment.  While yes it has a time lapse feature, regardless of what interval you choose, the maximum time the camera will stay in interval mode is 30 minutes.  So, if you are expecting to make a time lapse video longer than 2 seconds you need to restart the time lapse feature every 30 minutes. That and having 10 seconds as the lowest interval is not ideal.  If this is your purpose for the camera pass it by.  Refer to other reviews for thoughts on other features.

Reviews.Title: Good at first then Stops Working
Reviews.Author: Sheri
Reviews.Content: I received this gift after months of review.  As a wishlist I had got the Casio Exilim for Xmas and was happy when I went swimming and went under water it stopped working.  My dad who bought this for me does not have the receipt and I have no way of returning.  It is unfortunate it only worked for a couple months... I do not recommend this item :(

Reviews.Title: CAMARA CASIO EXILIM EX-G1
Reviews.Author: YOGER
Reviews.Content: SOY DE VENEZUELA, EL PRODUCTO ES MAGNÍFICO LLEGO EN BUEN ESTADO ES ORIGINAL, LOS RECOMIENDO.ES TREMENDO EQUIPO RESISTENTE A GOLPES (CAÍDAS) Y PUEDES TOMAR FOTOS BAJO EL AGUA.

Reviews.Title: Interval Shooting Flawed
Reviews.Author: Gregory Magee
Reviews.Content: This camera has average picture quality and a feature set that is slightly fewer than average for a camera of this price.  What was the selling point for me was it interval picture feature.  I wanted a simple point and shoot that I could set up to make time laspe photos of events.  The issue not listed any where in the product description is that the interval setting will only last for a maximum of 30 minutes.  The battery can go for several hours and the memory storage can be over a thousand pictures.  Why not let me go as long as memory or battery lasts?  I have events that can go 1-4 hours.  The camera can handle it, but the software hobbles the system.  Avoid if interval shooting is what you are after.  Much better cameras on the market for the same feature set and price range.

Reviews.Title: My item never arrived
Reviews.Author: judith
Reviews.Content: Hello Amazon,The present is to inform you that the item that I bouhgt never came to my hands. The delivery company (TRANSEXPRESS) told me that the package arrive empty (without the camera into) so now I don't know what to do.Could you help me and let me know what I have to do?Best regards,

Reviews.Title: HARDEST BEAUTY BUT THE LENT DON`T HELP SO MUCH...
Reviews.Author: juan carlos
Reviews.Content: THIS CAMERA IS REALLY RESISTENT, IS VERY BEAUTY AND LIGHT, HOWEVER I`M NOT AGREE WHIT IMAGEN, IT NEED A MORE QUALITY LENS...

Reviews.Title: Very happy.  Excellent camera, it is more than what I have expected
Reviews.Author: Manal Elkhoshkhany
Reviews.Content: I have not really used the camera that much yet, but so far, I am very happy with it.  I love the sleek design and the way the camera feels.  The quality of the pictures is great.

Reviews.Title: Casio lacked good indoor quality
Reviews.Author: Bruce C. Kiley
Reviews.Content: I had very high hopes for the Casio.  It did everything I wanted, BUT, I could just not get a good quality picture indoors.  Yes, I know its outdoor camera, but i really wanted it for all uses.

Ruggedized against shock, dirt, snow, low temperatures, water, and humidity
Multi-coated lens is water-repellent and prevents light reflection
12.1-megapixel resolution; 3x optical zoom
Advanced Dynamic Photo function; BEST SHOT function
Interval shooting function automatically takes still photos or movies at fixed intervals
Capture images and video to microSD, microSD /HC memory cards(not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Casio Exilim EX-G1 12.1 MP Slim-line Endurance Digital Camera with 3x Optical Zoom (Black)
